summary.what: Published Hugo site to GitHub Pages with example artifacts and versioned CHANGELOG
summary.why: Examples demonstrate real output from each draft template, making the value proposition tangible for new users. Versioned CHANGELOG was missing release sections, making it useless for tracking what shipped when.
summary.how: Generated 5 example artifacts with opus, added site/content/examples/ section with Hugo nav. Rewrote CHANGELOG.md with proper v0.1.0/v0.2.0/v0.3.0 sections. Updated changelog template v5 to support version headings via --append. Rewrote just release recipe to generate changelog, commit, tag, and push in one step.
